languages.text: "В плен? Как можешь рассуждать о плене ты, сидящ{mf|ий|ая} на цепи лживой веры в {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}мертвого бога{/g}?"

traits.locale_text: "В плен? Как можешь рассуждать о плене ты, сидящ{mf|ий|ая} на цепи лживой веры в {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}мертвого бога{/g}?"

languages.text: "Surrender? The gall of it. You are chained to the falsehood of a {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}dead god{/g}'s religion. Captives do not take captives."
languages.original_text: "В плен? Как можешь рассуждать о плене ты, сидящ{mf|ий|ая} на цепи лживой веры в {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}мертвого бога{/g}?"

traits.locale_text: "Surrender? The gall of it. You are chained to the falsehood of a {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}dead god{/g}'s religion. Captives do not take captives."
"Surrender? The gall of it. You are chained to the falsehood of a {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}dead god{/g}'s religion. Captives do not take captives."
"Surrender? The gall of it. You are chained to the falsehood of a {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}dead god{/g}'s religion. Captives do not take captives."
"Surrender? The gall of it. You are chained to the falsehood of a {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}dead god{/g}'s religion. Captives do not take captives."
"Surrender? The gall of it. You are chained to the falsehood of a {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}dead god{/g}'s religion. Captives do not take captives."
"Surrender? The gall of it. You are chained to the falsehood of a {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}dead god{/g}'s religion. Captives do not take captives."

languages.text: "Ergeben? Ihr traut Euch was. Ihr seid an die Lügen der Religion eines {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}toten Gottes{/g} gekettet. Gefangene nehmen keine Gefangenen."
languages.original_text: "Surrender? The gall of it. You are chained to the falsehood of a {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}dead god{/g}'s religion. Captives do not take captives."

traits.locale_text: "Ergeben? Ihr traut Euch was. Ihr seid an die Lügen der Religion eines {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}toten Gottes{/g} gekettet. Gefangene nehmen keine Gefangenen."

languages.text: « Me rendre ? Jamais ! Vous êtes {mf|enchaîné|enchaînée} aux mensonges du culte d'un {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}dieu mort{/g}. Les captifs ne font pas de prisonniers... »
languages.original_text: "Surrender? The gall of it. You are chained to the falsehood of a {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}dead god{/g}'s religion. Captives do not take captives."

traits.locale_text: « Me rendre ? Jamais ! Vous êtes {mf|enchaîné|enchaînée} aux mensonges du culte d'un {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}dieu mort{/g}. Les captifs ne font pas de prisonniers... »

languages.text: “投降？何等厚颜无耻的发言。你自己就是个俘虏，被{g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}已死之神{/g}的虚假信仰所束缚，俘虏可没资格俘获他人。
languages.original_text: "Surrender? The gall of it. You are chained to the falsehood of a {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}dead god{/g}'s religion. Captives do not take captives."

traits.locale_text: “投降？何等厚颜无耻的发言。你自己就是个俘虏，被{g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}已死之神{/g}的虚假信仰所束缚，俘虏可没资格俘获他人。

languages.text: 「降伏？よく言うものだ。貴様は{g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}死した神{/g}の宗教の嘘に縛られている。囚人は囚人の手を取らない」
languages.original_text: "Surrender? The gall of it. You are chained to the falsehood of a {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}dead god{/g}'s religion. Captives do not take captives."

traits.locale_text: 「降伏？よく言うものだ。貴様は{g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}死んだ神{/g}の宗教の嘘に縛られている。囚人は囚人の手を取らない」

languages.text: «¿Rendirme? Qué desfachatez. Estás atrapad{mf|o|a} en la falsedad de la religión de un {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}dios muerto{/g}. Los prisioneros no hacen prisioneros».
languages.original_text: "Surrender? The gall of it. You are chained to the falsehood of a {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}dead god{/g}'s religion. Captives do not take captives."

traits.locale_text: «¿Rendirme? Qué desfachatez. Estás atrapad{mf|o|a} en la falsedad de la religión de un {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}dios muerto{/g}. Los prisioneros no hacen prisioneros».

languages.text: "Teslim olmak mı? Bu ne cüret? {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Ölü tanrının{/g} sapkın yollarına zincirli olan sizsiniz. Esirler, başkalarını esir alamaz."
languages.original_text: "Surrender? The gall of it. You are chained to the falsehood of a {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}dead god{/g}'s religion. Captives do not take captives."

traits.locale_text: "Teslim olmak mı? Bu ne cüret? {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Ölü tanrı{/g}nın sapkın yollarına zincirli olan sizsiniz. Esirler, başkalarını esir alamaz."
